name: Shockwing
description: The Shockwing resembles a giant moth with notable electrical qualities, featuring notable agility and a striking appearance.
memorable: It can stun opponents with its electric burst while being immune to lightning damage.
goals: Typically engage in aerial combat and quickly dispatch foes.
relations: May be encountered alongside other beasts or creatures drawn to electrical phenomena.
environment: Often found in areas with storms or electric disturbances.
strengths: Immunity to lightning damage and ability to stun multiple enemies at once.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma, limited to physical attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a proboscis attack that deals piercing and additional lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fulminating Wings, which stuns creatures in a large area.
senses: Possesses darkvision and has advantage on perception checks that rely on smell.
skills: Excels in stealth with a +4 bonus, making it adept at avoiding detection.
additional_information: Capable of creating area-of-effect lightning damage.
Has an impressive Dexterity score for evasion.
Low damage output compared to other creatures for its CR.
Can deliver continuous lightning damage within close range.
Notable for its ability to operate effectively in both the air and on land.
test_queries: moth that deals area lightning damage
